content.abstract: Let‘s Encrypt™ is now the provider for AutoSSL and hostname SSL certificates.

name.short: Let‘s Encrypt™ for AutoSSL and hostname SSL certificates.
name.long: Let‘s Encrypt™ for AutoSSL and hostname SSL certificates.

locale_abstract_strings: locale.maketext('We are now using [asis,Let’s Encrypt™] to provide hostname [asis,SSL] certificates instead of [asis,Sectigo].')
locale.maketext('We have also configured [asis,AutoSSL] to use the [asis,Let’s Encrypt™] provider.')
locale.maketext('We have deprecated the [asis,Sectigo] [asis,AutoSSL] provider. It will no longer function at a future date.')
